item.title: Drug Dog Jake Gets Sick From Holy Ship
item.description: This one drug dog named Jake got sick when he OVERDOSED while working the Holy Ship event. He had to be rushed to the PET HOSPITAL to get help and was given narcan. They think he OD’d on ecstasy which isn’t even something narcan helps with, how scary! Luckily, Jake is fine now though!
